Hey, found out about this from torrentfreak, you guys did a great job on this! Do you think you'll expand this to other things besides movies? Would be pretty cool to see a similarly well-made "zerobay", especially if it'll have a web-based torrent client. 

Anyway, cheers and keep up the good work!
